statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE product_id = 456 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Feedback FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE product_id = 101 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating < 3 AND customer_id = 25;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE product_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id, feedback_text, created_at FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT review_text, review_rating, review_date FROM product_reviews WHERE product_id = 456 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_id, product_id, review_rating FROM product_reviews WHERE review_rating > 4 AND customer_id = 789 ORDER BY review_rating DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, created_at FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM product_reviews WHERE product_id = 20 AND review_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, review_rating, review_text FROM product_reviews WHERE customer_id = 15 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductReviews WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, improvement_description, priority FROM ProductImprovements WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND rating < 3;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductReviews WHERE rating = (SELECT MAX(rating) FROM ProductReviews);
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT product_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback, AVG(feedback_date) AS avg_feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews WHERE review_rating > 4;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT review_id, review_text, review_rating FROM CustomerReviews WHERE product_id = 200 ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews, AVG(review_rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerReviews GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_reviews > 3 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT product_id, improvement_description FROM ProductImprovements WHERE implemented = TRUE
SELECT customer_id, total_reviews, avg_rating, last_review_date FROM CustomerAnalytics ORDER BY last_review_date ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM CustomerReview WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM ProductFeedback WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
